lead_paragraph: RICH--Sylvia Randolph. March 25, 2016, age 97, peacefully at home, in Scarsdale, NY. One of ten children, Sylvia emigrated from Montreal to New York at 15 and worked to put herself through high school and college. Sylvia practiced photography as a professional before earning a Masters degree and teaching biology at Rye Neck High School. Married to Clifford Rich for 50 years, she was passionate about teaching, travel, playing the piano and cooking. Sylvia was a gracious hostess who created a beautiful and welcoming home filled with good food, art and music. Her laugh was infectious and her sparkling blue-gray eyes never faded with time. She will be deeply missed by her children Charles, Constance and Peter, her daughters-in-law Peggy and Allegra, her granddaughter Mariel and her granddog Marsha. 1/3
